'''Gutsy Gibbon''' is the code name for Ubuntu 7.10. It was released on '''18 October 2007'''. See the <nowiki>[[GutsyReleaseSchedule]]</nowiki> .  

* The name "Gutsy Gibbon" was announced <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel-announce/2007-April/000276.html|in the mailing lists]]</nowiki> by MarkShuttleworth.
* Gutsy goals are recorded in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/gutsy/+specs|Launchpad]]</nowiki>.
* download link : <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/gutsy/]]</nowiki>
